Title: Voyage Through the Cosmos: Beyond Mars
Description: Join us for a 60-second interstellar journey beyond Mars. Explore the mysteries of outer planets and distant galaxies. #SpaceExploration #CosmosShorts #CodeWorthy

Scenes.VoiceOverText: Embark on a voyage beyond Mars, venturing further into the mysteries of our solar system and beyond.
Scenes.Description: A stunning visualization of a spacecraft journeying past Mars towards the outer planets.
Scenes.Text: Embark on a voyage beyond Mars, venturing further into the mysteries of our solar system and beyond.

Scenes.VoiceOverText: Witness the majestic beauty of Jupiter, the largest planet in our solar system, with its swirling storms and moons.
Scenes.Description: Spectacular footage of Jupiter and its moons, focusing on the Great Red Spot.
Scenes.Text: Witness the majestic beauty of Jupiter, the largest planet in our solar system, with its swirling storms and moons.

Scenes.VoiceOverText: Sail past Saturn, admiring its magnificent rings and uncovering the secrets they hold.
Scenes.Description: Close-up visuals of Saturn's rings, with a backdrop of the vast cosmos.
Scenes.Text: Sail past Saturn, admiring its magnificent rings and uncovering the secrets they hold.

Scenes.VoiceOverText: Explore the icy mysteries of Uranus and Neptune, the outermost giants, shrouded in cold and mystery.
Scenes.Description: Animations showing the unique features of Uranus and Neptune, highlighting their cold, blue appearances.
Scenes.Text: Explore the icy mysteries of Uranus and Neptune, the outermost giants, shrouded in cold and mystery.

Scenes.VoiceOverText: Venture beyond our solar system, where countless galaxies and mysteries await. The cosmos is calling!
Scenes.Description: A breathtaking journey through a starfield, showcasing distant galaxies and nebulae.
Scenes.Text: Venture beyond our solar system, where countless galaxies and mysteries await. The cosmos is calling!
